description: South African FICA compliance checklist for individual clients. Covers identity verification, proof of address, source of funds, and risk assessment.

items.name: Verify identity document
items.description: Verify the client's identity using a certified copy of their SA ID or passport.
items.requiredDocumentLabel: Certified copy of SA ID or passport

items.name: Verify proof of address
items.description: Obtain a utility bill, bank statement, or municipal account not older than 3 months.
items.requiredDocumentLabel: Proof of residential address (not older than 3 months)

items.name: Confirm source of funds
items.description: Obtain documentation confirming the client's source of income or funds.

items.name: Perform risk assessment
items.description: Classify the client's risk rating based on FICA risk matrix. Depends on identity verification.

items.name: Confirm FICA compliance sign-off
items.description: Senior compliance officer signs off on FICA compliance for this client.
